title: PARIS 17 NO COMMISSION MONCEAU GARDENS A VERY NICE FLAT 2 BEDROOMS
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


PARIS 17 MONCEAU GARDENS A VERY NICE FLAT 2 BEDROOMS 
A VERY NICE flat all renovated all white paintings wooden floor 2 bedrooms, each room with its bathroom or shower room a very large double sitting room with chimney very sunny, and a kitchen all equipped with all the machines new refrigerator congelator and a newdisher. 

This nice flat is in a very good building stone very well secured digicode guardian and interphone, with carpets in stairs,  this  buildingstone is all renewed. 

The district is very well served tube stations Monceau Wagram or Malesherbes, a lot shops supermarkets and also Schools, universities, music school, bilingual school. and so. 10 minutes by feet ARC DE TRIOMPHE ETOILE; 

just available 2750 + 150 € fees central heating included.
